description: Shunsuke is Riju`s best friend. He is a handsome young man, and appears very manly next to the feminine Riju. Shunsuke writes novels under the pen name of Shunka Saki. Though he is detested initially by Chisato, his books were the primary inspirations for Chisato`s own writing career. Shunsuke has been in love with Chisato for years, but was always afraid of betraying Riju, until he learns that Chisato is in love with his alter-ego. He is a confident, ambitious teen.
name: Sakaki Shunsuke
